00040 /* class which implements the transaction payment wizard (as non-linear state machine). */
00041 class PayWizard : public QWizard
00042 {
00043     Q_OBJECT
00044 
00045     public:
00046         /* payment wizard states' indexes enumeration data type. */
00047         typedef enum payWizardState {
00048             Page_SelectPayWay = 0,
00049             Page_InsertCash,
00050             Page_InsertCard,
00051             Page_Complete
00052         } payWizardState;
00053 
00054         PayWizard(const QString custName, const double charge, QWidget *parent = 0);
00055 
00056     protected:
00057         void closeEvent(QCloseEvent *event);
00058 };
00059
